Class.name: COVID.Countries
Class.Description: Data sourced from https://population.un.org/wpp/Download/Standard/CSV/ Scrubbing some groupings and appropriating some countries' spelling to align with COVID data

Method.name: Load
Method.Implementation:
set tSC = ..%KillExtent() set tXData = ##class(%Dictionary.XDataDefinition).%OpenId($classname()_"||data") do tXData.Data.ReadLine() // skip wrapper do tXData.Data.ReadLine() // skip header while 'tXData.Data.AtEnd { set tLine = tXData.Data.ReadLine() quit:tLine="<data>"
set tCountry = ..%New() set tCountry.Country = $piece(tLine,$c(9),1) set tCountry.Population = $tr($piece(tLine,$c(9),2),".") set tCountry.PopulationDensity = $tr($piece(tLine,$c(9),3),".") set tSC = tCountry.%Save() quit:$$$ISERR(tSC) } quit tSC
